Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.23220638]Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=100 µg/mL);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=80 µg/mL).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.23220638]5% hemolytic activity at 10 μg/mL, 10% hemolytic activity at 20 μg/mL, 10% hemolytic activity at 100 μg/mL against porcine fresh blood
Sequence Information.Function: The recombinant pBD142 exhibited antimicrobial activity against both Gram-positive Staphylococcus aureus and Gram-negative E. coli including the multi-resistant E. coli. Shows hemolytic activity and high thermal stability.
